tool_description: Ελληνικό Ορθόδοξο εορτολόγιο για τα έτη 2023 έως και 2028.
name: Greek Eortologio
title: Greek Eortologio

api_list.name: Get the day
api_list.description: Gets the day of the month of the year
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://greek-eortologio.p.rapidapi.com/2024/11/25"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greek-eortologio.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://greek-eortologio.p.rapidapi.com/{year}/{month}/{day}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "greek-eortologio.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
